ARMOR_DESC_NONE: Receives 50% more damage from all weapons.
ARMOR_DESC_LIGHT: Receives 50% less damage from heavy weapons and 50% more from light weapons.
ARMOR_DESC_MEDIUM: Receives neutral damage from all weapons.
ARMOR_DESC_HEAVY: Receives 50% less damage from light weapons and 50% more from heavy weapons.
ARMOR_DESC_OMEGA: Receives 50% less damage from all weapons.
WEAPON_DESC_LIGHT: Deals 50% less damage to heavy armors and 50% more to light armors.
WEAPON_DESC_MEDIUM: Deals neutral damage to all armors.
WEAPON_DESC_HEAVY: Deals 50% less damage to light armors and 50% more to heavy armors.
CLIMATE_DESC_NONE: This is a bug and should be reported!
CLIMATE_DESC_TEMPERATE: Temperate climate, mild precipitations, nothing abnormal
CLIMATE_DESC_ARID: Hot and hostile, troops stationed here deal -25% damage
CLIMATE_DESC_BOREAL: Cold and hostile, troops stationed here deal -25% damage
CLIMATE_DESC_BARREN: Sweltering and unbearable, troops stationed here deal -50% damage
CLIMATE_DESC_ARCTIC: Frigid and unbearable, troops stationed here deal -50% damage
CLIMATE_DESC_LUNAR: Uninhabitable, troops stationed here deal -75% damage
CLIMATE_DESC_MARTIAN: Uninhabitable, troops stationed here deal -75% damage
CLIMATE_DESC_HELLISH: Uninhabitable, troops stationed here deal -90% damage
CURRENCY_DESC_NONE: This is a bug and should be reported!
MOVEMENT_DESC_WHEELED: Very fast but does not do well in rugged terrain
MOVEMENT_DESC_TRACKED: A good balance of speed and versatility
MOVEMENT_DESC_RAIL: This unit is restricted to railways
MOVEMENT_DESC_RUDDER: This unit is restricted to water
MOVEMENT_DESC_HEAVY_RUDDER: This unit is restricted to the open sea
MOVEMENT_DESC_AMPHIBIOUS: This unit can fight both on land and in shallow bodies of water
